Equipment Actions.Action 1: Tentacle, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 12 Bludgeoning, Can cause a unique Disease
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range : 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 2: Enslave, The Aboleth can target a creature within 30ft of it and attempt to magically charm the target, enslaving them when successful

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Aboleth can breath air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Mucous Cloud, While underwater, the Aboleth is surrounded by a transformative mucus.  Touching the mucus can cause a disease which forces the affected creature to only be able to breath underwater
Abilities.Ability 3: Probing Telepathy, When communicating with a creature telepathically, the aboleth can learn the creature's greatest desires
Abilities.Ability 4: Disease, Caused by the Aboleth's Tentacle attack.  An afflicted creature will take acid damge while outside a body of water every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed

Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Swipe, Makes one tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Psychic Drain, One creature charmed by the Aboleth takes psychic damage and the Aboleth heals equal to the damage the creature took

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Aboleth can cast Phantasmal Force on any number of creatures it can see within 60ft of it
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Aboleth can cause pools of water within 90ft of it to surge outward in a grasping tide, attempting to suck any nearby creatures into the pool
Lair Actions.Action 3: The Aboleth can use any water within its lair as a conduit to extend the range of its abilities
